message: Bob, I'm pleased to offer you the chance to purchase this incredible product.  It's truly one-of-a-kind and I know you'll find it incredibly valuable. I'm initially offering it for $1,500,000.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to offer $1,200,000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I believe the value of this product is significantly higher than that.  I'm willing to come down slightly to $1,400,000. This is my final offer.

I understand your perspective, Alice. Given our previous discussions, I would like to propose an offer of $1,350,000 for the product. I hope this proposal is more in line with what you're considering.
